MailTemp.Subject: Your Partnership Goals Need Your Attention
MailTemp.Body:
Dear $ParentName$,
Your success means everything to your child $ChildName$ as well as you and I,together we created a $FPAGoal$ to help improve your family's life.
I appreciate the time you spend to inform me of your status.
Click this link to update the steps to your goal.
URL: $Link$
Yours truly,
$FSWName$
Family Service Worker,CDCFC Head Start
Please do not reply to this email,I will not get your response!
